mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_orders (id, user_id, product_id, product_name, amount, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{amount}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, product_id as productId, product_name as productName, amount, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM tb_orders WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_orders SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
